#Syntax highlight editor for Windows Forms 2.0+.

===History===
The *SyntaxBox* is a very only project of mine.
It started back in 2002 when me and my brother formed the company *"Compona"*
Our aim was to sell components over the internet.
Our first product was the Compona SyntaxBox and was pretty much an instant success since there were very few competing products at that time.

Since we ran our company on our sparetime and I was the only developer of the SyntaxBox, I ended up with a crapload of support cases.
After a few yeaars I had to give up since I had virtually no free time of my own anymore.
